General.Name: Prim S.A.
General.Description: Prim, S.A. provides health technology, mobility, and health care products in Spain. The company offers collar, clavicle, armsling, hand and finger, shoulder, elbow, and wrist products. Its lower limbs products include calf brace, thigh, hip, knee, ankle, and foot related products. The company also provides shoulder and back supports, bands, corsets, hyperextension braces, and thoracic protectors. It offers its products under the OrthoPrim, AirMed, Airtex, Airtex Plus, aqtivo skin, aqtivo sport, ComforGel, ComforGel Lady, ComforSil, Essencial, Mottio, MyPrim, Neoprair, Neoprair One Size, PrimSpine, and Olium brands. Prim, S.A. was founded in 1870 and is headquartered in Móstoles, Spain.
General.Address: Calle Yolanda GonzAlez, number 15, Móstoles, Spain, 28938
